mapper.select: SELECT interview_room_id, user_id, interview_room_title, interview_category, difficulty_level, evaluation_strictness, interview_room_status, interview_room_created_at FROM INTERVIEW_ROOM WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND interview_room_status != 'EXPIRED' ORDER BY interview_room_id DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INTERVIEW_ROOM WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND interview_room_status != 'EXPIRED'

SELECT interview_room_id, user_id, interview_room_title, interview_category, difficulty_level, evaluation_strictness, interview_room_status, interview_room_memo, interview_room_created_at FROM INTERVIEW_ROOM WHERE interview_room_id = #{interviewRoomId}
SELECT interview_room_id, interview_room_title, interview_room_created_at FROM INTERVIEW_ROOM WHERE parent_interview_room_id = #{parentInterviewRoomId} ORDER BY interview_room_created_at ASC
SELECT interview_role, interview_message, message_created_at FROM INTERVIEW WHERE interview_room_id = #{interviewRoomId} ORDER BY interview_id ASC
SELECT interview_message FROM interview WHERE interview_room_id = #{roomId} AND interview_role = 'AI' AND interview_message LIKE '[총평]%' ORDER BY interview_id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT interview_room_id, user_id, interview_room_title, interview_category, difficulty_level, evaluation_strictness, interview_room_status, interview_room_created_at FROM INTERVIEW_ROOM ORDER BY interview_room_id DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
